doc.field: Time Inc. Fortune Publishing and Business Records
Time Inc. Fortune Publishing and Business Records
Series IV. Fortune Data Bank Publications Fulfillment Files
Series IV. Fortune Data Bank Publications Fulfillment Files

Fortune Data Bank Publications Fulfillment Files contains a sampling of requests from readers to purchase other publications by Fortune advertised in the magazine. These include editorial studies, market surveys, directories, and conference reports designed to "give you an edge in expertise, get you more for your management money." Publications include "Business and Banking", "Crosscurrents", "DDP Decisions", "Double 500 Directory", "Why Corporate America Moves Where", "Working Smarter", and "World Business Directory".
